SEARCH
Package guiModeration

Class ViewModerationDashboard

java.lang.Object
guiModeration.ViewModerationDashboard
public class ViewModerationDashboard extends Object

Title: ViewModerationDashboard Class

Description: Staff moderation interface (View component) for reviewing posts, flagging inappropriate content, and sending private feedback. This class manages the layout, controls, and display logic for the moderation dashboard, delegating functional tasks to the ControllerModeration.

User Stories:

  • Staff flags content and sends private feedback.
  • Admin oversight of moderation activity.

Version:
1.00 2025-11-12 Moderation Implementation

  • Method Details

    • displayModerationDashboard

      public static void displayModerationDashboard(javafx.stage.Stage ps, String staffUsername, boolean adminRole)
      Displays the moderation dashboard by setting up the scene and showing the stage. This method is the entry point for the moderation view. * @param ps The primary JavaFX Stage (window) to display the dashboard in.
      Parameters:
      staffUsername - The username of the current staff member.
      adminRole - A boolean indicating whether the user possesses the admin role.

    • refreshPostsList

      protected static void refreshPostsList()
      Refreshes the data displayed in the table_Posts based on the currently selected filter option and search text. Also updates statistics and button states.

    • updateStatistics

      protected static void updateStatistics()
      Fetches and updates the moderation statistics (Total Posts, Flagged Posts, Pending Flags) using the ControllerModeration and sets the text of the corresponding labels.

    • showSuccess

      protected static void showSuccess(String message)
      Displays a success alert box (INFORMATION type) to the user. * @param message The success message to display to the user.

    • showError

      protected static void showError(String title, String message)
      Displays an error alert box (ERROR type) to the user. * @param title The header or title for the error alert.
      Parameters:
      message - The detailed error message content.
